*Numerical definition of the type of market data to be imported into the taskbar.*
{{{
    enum {
        MaofStream = 48,
        RezefStream = 49,
        MaofCNTStream = 50,
        RezefCNTStream = 51,
        IndexStream = 52
    } K300StreamType;
}}}

*Remarks:*
 * [MaofStream  K300StreamType] is Maof options trading
 * [K300StreamType MaofCNTStream] and [K300StreamType RezefCNTStream] are probably not used
